cosmically adverb
(EXTREMELY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
informal extremely: He is cosmically ill-suited to serve in a legislative body. She discovers that the publication is bankrolled by a cosmically wealthy advertising mogul.
More examplesFewer examplesWe were angry that we missed out on a recess for something so cosmically stupid.Parallel lines will never meet, even over cosmically large distances. Robert W. C. Kennedy is cosmically creepy as the charm-challenged Kurt.
